markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Animal Rage](/Feats.aspx?ID=151) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 91 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[animal instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

You transform into your animal. You gain the effects of the 3rd-level [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=10) spell except you use your own statistics, temporary Hit Points, and unarmed attacks instead of those granted by animal form. You also retain the constant abilities of your gear. If your animal is a frog, your tongue’s reach increases to 15 feet. Dismissing the transformation gains the rage trait.
name: Animal Rage

<summary>
You transform into your animal.
</summary>
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 8" pfs="Standard" > Animal Rage Single Action Source Core Rulebook pg. 91 4.0 Prerequisites animal instinct --- You transform into your animal. You gain the effects of the 3rd-level animal form spell except you use your own statistics, temporary Hit Points, and unarmed attacks instead of those granted by animal form. You also retain the constant abilities of your gear. If your animal is a frog, your tongue’s reach increases to 15 feet. Dismissing the transformation gains the rage trait.
